short_summary: Temporary Help Services Requirement. The requirement is for Department of National Defense (DND).
description: Temporary help services for Department of National Defense. Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above.
full_summary:
# Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)

## Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Number: S4480581
* Reference Number: cb-7321-79607227
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: July 18, 2023
* Tender Closing Date and Time: July 21, 2023 at 10:30:00 AM
* Amendment Date: July 21, 2023

## Solicitation Description

This solicitation is for Temporary Help Services to be provided under the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR). Only suppliers who are qualified under the streams and categories listed below are invited to submit a proposal:

* Stream: 5.1 Computer, Application Support
* Invited Suppliers under SA EN578-172870:
  + 7792395 Canada Inc.
  + Akkada Professional Services Inc.
  + Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
  + Calian Ltd.
  + Coradix technology Consulting Ltd.
  + DLS Technology Corporation
  + Excel Human Resources Inc.
  + Maverin Inc.
  + OLAV CONSULTING CORP., MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION, IN JOINT VENTURE
  + Procom Consultants Group Ltd.
  + S.I. SYSTEMS ULC
  + Spirit Personnel Inc.
  + T.E.S. Contract Services INC.
  + Tundra Technical Solutions Inc
  + Valcom Consulting group Inc.

## Description of the Requirement

The Department of National Defense (DND) requires Temporary Help Services, and has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) to suppliers who have qualified under the listed streams and categories.

## Level of Security Requirement

The minimum security level required for resources is Secret.

## Attachments

The full solicitation package is available for download from the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7321/s4480581-rfp-%28en.pdf) (English) or [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7321/s4480581-rfp-%28fr.pdf) (French).

Please contact the Contracting Authority below for any questions or concerns:

**Contracting Authority:**

* Department of National Defense
* 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K2H8G1
* Phone:
